allow: Bash(# First start a session curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/start -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a""}'' # Submit clue type \(0 = Standard\) curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/input -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a"", ""value"": 0}'' # Continue past teaching curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/continue -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a""}'' # Submit definition [0,1,2,3] curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/input -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a"", ""value"": [0,1,2,3]}'' # Continue past teaching curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/continue -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a""}'' # Now we should be at synonym step 1, fodder phase - submit [4,5] curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5001/training/input -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clueId"": ""times-29453-1a"", ""value"": [4,5]}'')

Bash(# Start session curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/start"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""puzzle_number"": ""29453"", ""clue_number"": ""11"", ""direction"": ""across""}'' # Choose Standard curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/input"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-11a"", ""input"": ""Standard""}'' # Continue through the teaching phase curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-11a""}'' # See where we are now curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-11a""}'')

Bash(# Start a fresh session curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/start"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""puzzle_number"": ""29453"", ""clue_number"": ""4"", ""direction"": ""across""}'' # Choose Standard curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/input"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a"", ""input"": ""Standard""}'' # Continue to get to a step curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a""}'' curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a""}'' # Now test solve-step curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/solve-step"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a""}'')

Bash(# Start fresh session curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/start"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""puzzle_number"": ""29453"", ""clue_number"": ""4"", ""direction"": ""across""}'' # Choose Standard curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/input"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a"", ""input"": ""Standard""}'' # Continue to interactive step curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a""}'' # Check what phase we''re on curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/continue"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""clue_id"": ""times-29453-4a""}'')

Bash(# Make a request that should trigger reload curl -s -X POST ""http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/start"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ''{""puzzle_number"": ""29453"", ""clue_number"": ""27"", ""direction"": ""across"", ""clue_text"": ""See Dogma remade as massive hit \(8\)""}'' && grep -i ""Auto-reload\\|Loaded.*clues"" /tmp/server.log)
Bash(# Clear old log and restart fresh lsof -ti:8080)
Bash(# Kill server and restart with output capture kill -9 78349 78369 sleep 1 cd /Users/andrewmackenzie/Desktop/Grid\\ Reader && python3 crossword_server.py 2>&1)

Bash(# Test reveal on 12A \(anagram with pieces\) curl -s -X POST ''http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/start'' -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''{""puzzle_number"":""29453"",""clue_number"":""12"",""direction"":""across"",""clue_text"":""Concerning sight as head of office IT struggles with PC""}'' && \\ curl -s -X POST ''http://127.0.0.1:8080/trainer/reveal'' -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''{""clue_id"":""times-29453-12a""}'')
